invalid_api_params.message: At least one parameter is invalid or missing. See err.error_data for more details.

unauthorized_api_request.message: We could not authenticate the request. Please review your credentials and authentication method.

invalid_or_expired_jwt_token.message: We could not authenticate the request. Please review your credentials and authentication method.

resource_not_found.message: The requested resource could not be located.

data_not_found.message: Data for the requested resources not found.

insufficient_funds.message: The account executing the transaction or transfer does not have sufficient funds to complete the transaction or transfer.
